Token.Abstract: Provides an omnipresent factory which simplifies the creation of core data objects
Creates or overwrites the object represented in the source data.

Parameter.Name: objectClass
Parameter.Abstract: The class of the object at the top level of the collection (person, in the example from discussion)

Parameter.Name: sourceData
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary that contains the source (i.e. parsed JSON data from a server)

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The NSManagedObjectContext that will be used to create/retrieve the object

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Any errors that occur will be populated to this address

ReturnValue.Abstract: The array of object that were created or retrieved

Token.Abstract: Updates an object with source data

Parameter.Name: sourceData
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary containing the object source data

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Any errors that occur will be populated to this address

ReturnValue.Abstract: A boolean indicating success or failure

Token.Abstract: Overwrites or creates an object with source data

Parameter.Name: sourceData
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary containing the object source data

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Any errors that occur will be populated to this address

ReturnValue.Abstract: A boolean indicating success or failure
